title: Tracesoccer
description: Tracesoccer is a modern adaptation of the classic pen-and-paper strategy game, also known as paper soccer or paper hockey. It blends strategic planning with the thrill of competition in a turn-based format, offering exciting gameplay for both casual players and competitive strategists. Whether youâ€™re playing against friends, AI, or online opponents, the challenge is to outmaneuver your rival to score the winning goal!
